title: Experimental performance evaluation of V2X communication in Test field for Connected and Automated Driving
description:
• Develop expertise in the foundational technical aspects of Car2X communications, encompassing both vehicle-to-vehicle and vehicle-to-infrastructure interactions.
        • Acquire comprehensive insights into the principles underlying test field design and configuration to ensure optimal
        performance and reliability
        • Execute precise performance measurements for Car2X systems, utilizing advanced testing methodologies and tools
        • Demonstrate proficiency in addressing various safety scenarios within the Car2X communication context, emphasizing a proactive approach to ensuring robust and secure communicatio
